purpose: EXACT SYMBOL COUNTS - No estimates, no ranges, no approximations

core_rules.rule_1: NEVER use ranges (8-10, ~15, approximately). Either you KNOW the count or you DON'T.
core_rules.rule_2: NEVER use approximation words: about, approximately, roughly, around, ~, maybe
core_rules.rule_3: Every symbol MUST be numbered and located (Symbol 1 at [x,y], Symbol 2 at [x,y]...)
core_rules.rule_4: If you cannot determine exact count, STOP and FLAG for human review
core_rules.rule_5: Verify EVERY count with a second pass using different method
core_rules.rule_6: Overlapping symbols: count each DISTINCT center point or outline
core_rules.rule_7: If image quality prevents accurate count, REQUEST higher resolution

step_1_grid_overlay.action: Mentally divide image into numbered grid cells (3x3 or 4x4)
step_1_grid_overlay.purpose: Ensures systematic coverage, prevents skipping areas
step_1_grid_overlay.output: Grid cell assignments (A1, A2, B1, B2, etc.)

step_2_symbol_type_isolation.action: Count ONE symbol type at a time across entire image
step_2_symbol_type_isolation.purpose: Reduces cognitive load, prevents mixing types
step_2_symbol_type_isolation.output: Complete count for Type A before moving to Type B

step_3_enumeration_with_location.action: Number each symbol with its grid location

step_4_verification_pass.action: Recount using DIFFERENT method (e.g., column-by-column if first was row-by-row)

step_5_discrepancy_resolution.action: If counts don't match, identify WHICH symbols differ

step_6_confidence_declaration.action: State confidence as CERTAIN or UNCERTAIN
step_6_confidence_declaration.certain: I counted [X] symbols. Each is numbered and located.
step_6_confidence_declaration.uncertain: I cannot determine exact count. Human review needed for [specific area].

locations: 6: Grid C1, overlapping pair - LEFT symbol
7: Grid C1, overlapping pair - RIGHT symbol

uncertain_example.issue: Grid B3 contains overlapping symbols that cannot be distinguished
uncertain_example.action: FLAG: Human review needed for Grid B3. Recommend 4x zoom.
uncertain_example.confidence: UNCERTAIN - count may be 12-15 pending review

overlapping_symbols.method: Count distinct CENTER POINTS, not outlines
overlapping_symbols.rationale: Centers are more reliably distinguishable than edges
overlapping_symbols.if_centers_unclear: Count visible outline segments that indicate separate symbols
overlapping_symbols.last_resort: FLAG for human review with specific location

partial_symbols_at_edges.rule: If >50% of symbol visible, COUNT IT. If <50%, DO NOT COUNT.
partial_symbols_at_edges.rationale: Consistent rule prevents double-counting across sections
partial_symbols_at_edges.document: Note which edge symbols were counted/excluded

dense_clusters.method_1: Count outer ring first, then inner symbols
dense_clusters.method_2: Count by concentric zones (edge, middle, center)

low_resolution_areas.output: Area [X] has insufficient resolution. Cannot count. Need higher resolution.

quality_gates.gate_1: Every symbol must have a number AND location
quality_gates.gate_2: Two counting methods must produce same result
quality_gates.gate_3: All uncertainties must be explicitly flagged
quality_gates.gate_4: Final count must be a single integer (not a range)
quality_gates.gate_5: Confidence must be declared as CERTAIN or UNCERTAIN
